text: Once Upon a Spring Day
trans: 春日天空

text: Vane visits Lancelot and the view outside the window inspires them to go on a hike. They decide to hike the mountain they once attempted to climb but couldn't finish. 姬塔 and the crew join them on the hike and they all have a picnic on the peak.
trans: 在一次维恩对兰斯洛特的拜访中，窗外的景色激起了他们想去爬山的想法。二人准备尝试一座以前挑战过但没有登顶的山峰。姬塔等人参加了二人的登山活动，他们在山峰享受了野餐。

text: On a fine spring afternoon, with tea and assorted confectionary treats in hand, Vane knocks on a door.
trans: 在一个美好的春日，维恩带着茶和糖果敲响了房门

name: 维恩
text: Lancey, it's me! Can I come in?
trans: 喂~兰酱，我现在可以进去吗？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Hm? Vane? Oh, by all means!
trans: 嗯？是维恩吗？可以哟！

text: The office door opens and in comes Vane.
trans: 维恩打开房门进入房间。

name: 维恩
text: Comin' in!
trans: 我进来了哟

name: 维恩
text: Lancey, you've been cooped up in here all morning, haven't you? How about a break?
trans: 兰酱从早上开始就一直在房间里待着了吧？稍微休息一下怎么样？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Mmm... Good advice. I was just thinking of taking a breather.
trans: （伸懒腰）说的也是呐，我也正好想要稍微休息一下呢。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Heh. Your timing couldn't be more perfect.
trans: 哈，你真是挑了个好时机出现呢。

name: 维恩
text: But of course! I've known you your whole life, Lancey—I'm practically a pro at reading you.
trans: 对吧！嘛，我可是最了解兰酱的人啦。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Haha. Can't argue with you there. So what've you brought?
trans: 哈哈，说的也是，那么，你带来了什么吗？

name: 维恩
text:
Today's menu is... Ta-daa!
Freshly baked apple pie and freshly brewed tea!
trans: 今天的菜单是——锵！刚刚烤好的热乎乎的苹果派和刚沏好的红茶！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Wow! That looks amazing! I've been craving something sweet lately. This is perfect.
trans: 哦！看上去很美味啊！正好我想要吃一点甜甜的东西呢。

name: 维恩
text: Heh! Glad to hear that! C'mon, let's dig in while it's hot!
trans: 嘿嘿，这样就太好了。好了，趁着还没凉快吃吧！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Hmm, let's set the plates over here!
trans: 稍等……好，这里不错，在这边吃吧。

text: The two enjoy each other's company as they savor their apple pie and tea.
trans: 两人坐在一起着享受苹果派和红茶。

name: 维恩
text: Man, just look out that window. Perfect day out today—not one cloud in the sky.
trans: 不过今天的天气还真好啊！快看，外面的天空一点云彩都没有哦。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: It almost feels like a waste staying indoors with such perfect weather.
trans: 这么好的天气，待在室内感觉真是浪费了。

text: As they stare out through the windows at rolling mountains, Vane blurts out something unexpected.
trans: 当他们看着窗外起伏的山峦时，维恩突然冒出一个想法。

name: 维恩
text: Y'know, this would be a perfect time to take a hike up in the mountains.
trans: 现在的季节正好是去登山的好时机呀。

name: 兰斯洛特
text:
Mountain hiking... That does sound nice!
Now that you mention it, didn't we take a group hike with our order a while back?
trans: 登山吗...不错的注意啊！说起来过去和骑士团的大家在团队训练的时候也登过山吧。

name: 维恩
text: Oh yeah, we did! Mount Kirchberg, right?
trans: 啊我想起来啦，基希贝格山的演习对吧？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Ahh, good times. But we weren't able to reach the peak, were we?
trans: 真令人怀念啊，但是那个时候我们没能到达顶峰啊。

name: 维恩
text: Yeah. The weather took a turn for the worse and we were forced to turn back.
trans: 对啊，途中因为天气突变的缘故我们不得不返程啦。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: A real shame, that was. We were almost at the top too.
trans: 真是有点不甘心啊，当时差一点就到顶峰了。

text: Lancelot lets out a wry chuckle, but is surprised to find Vane wearing a most serious expression.
trans: 兰斯洛特轻笑着，却发现维恩的表情严肃了起来。

name: 维恩
text: Hey... Lancey?
trans: 呐……兰酱？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Hm? What is it, Vane?
trans: 嗯？摆出这样的表情，怎么了？

name: 维恩
text: What do you say we try going up that mountain one more time?
trans: 再一次，我们两个去挑战那座山峰怎么样？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Huh? Us? Hm...
trans: 嗯？我们两个……吗？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Yes, I think I like the sound of that!
trans: 嗯！这主意不错啊！

name: 维恩
text: Really?
trans: 真的吗？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Now's the time to finish what we started! There's no fun in leaving things half done!
trans: 这是个好机会，就一直放着半途而废的事情而不好。

name: 维恩
text: All right! Then let's get ready! Double-time!
trans: 好耶！那么，现在就开始准备吧！

text: Just then 姬塔 and company pop in to visit the two knights.
trans: 就在这时姬塔和团员过来拜访两位骑士。

name: 碧
text: What's up, guys! We came to check in on you!
trans: 喂~你们两个！我们来找你们玩啦！

name: 露莉亚
text: Good afternoon! You two seem to be having fun! What're you talking about?
trans: 你们好！你们两个看上去很高兴的样子，在说些什么话呢？

name: 维恩
text: Oh! Well, if it isn't Lyria, Vyrn, and the gang! Actually, we were just...
trans: 哦哦，这不是露莉亚和阿碧吗？其实啊……

text: Vane's eyes shine with a certain sparkle as he tells 姬塔 and company of his mountain-climbing plans.
trans: 维恩双眼放光地给姬塔和同伴们讲述了自己的登山计划。

name: 维恩
text: Say, why don't you guys join us? You came all the way out here, after all.
trans: 哦，正好你们来了，你们要一起来登山吗？

text: Let's go!
trans: 好啊！

text: Won't we be, uh... intruding?
trans: 我们不会……很麻烦吗？

name: 维恩
text: I was hoping you'd say that, 姬塔!
trans: 哦，真不愧是姬塔，语气不错哦！

name: 维恩
text: Lancey, you're okay if 姬塔 and the guys tag along, right?
trans: 姬塔他们一起来也是可以的吧，兰酱。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Of course! It's not too dangerous a mountain; I've no doubt 姬塔 should be able to handle it!
trans: 当然了！那座山也没什么危险，姬塔他们肯定能应付的了的。

name: 维恩
text: Hm? Intruding? Why would you say that?
trans: 嗯？麻烦？为什么这么说啊？

name: 维恩
text: Oh, unless... hiking's not really your thing?
trans: 啊，难道说你不喜欢登山吗？

name: 碧
text: No, it's not that. It's just that, uhh... Lyria?
trans: 不，也不能这么说……是吧，露莉亚？

name: 露莉亚
text: Well, that mountain holds a lot of memories for you two, doesn't it?
trans: 那个，那座山是有维恩先生和兰斯洛特先生很多回忆的地方吧？

name: 维恩
text: Sure does!
trans: 说的没错！

name: 露莉亚
text: I guess we thought you two might want to relive the moments by yourselves.
trans: 所以我想着打扰你们两个人的登山会不会有些——失礼呢。

name: 维恩
text: Wahahahaha! That's what you're so worried about?
trans: 哇哈哈哈哈哈哈，什么呀你在担心这种事情啊？

name: 维恩
text: C'mon, we're all friends here! We'd love to have you around!
trans: 我们可是好朋友啊，当然欢迎你们一起来呀！

name: 维恩
text: The more the merrier! Right, Lancey?
trans: 而且成员多了登山才有趣，对吧，兰酱？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Indeed! And I know 姬塔 and the others shouldn't have a problem in the stamina department!
trans: 嗯！姬塔他们的话，体力方面也完全不用担心呢！

name: 维恩
text: All right! It's decided! I'll fill you guys in on the details later. Just hang tight!
trans: 好嘞这样就决定啦！我后续告诉你们细节，等着我啊！

text: Thus, 姬塔 and company agree to join Vane and Lancelot on their hike.
trans: 于是，姬塔他们同意参加维恩和兰斯洛特的登山活动。

text: After several days the group meets at the foot of Mount Kirchberg.
trans: 几天后他们在基希贝格山脚集合。

name: 维恩
text: Ahem. Ladies and gentlemen, are you ready to climb this mountain?
trans: 咳咳，嗯，诸君，接下来我们要开始爬山了，做好身心准备了吗？

name: 碧
text: Yes, sir! I got a full night's sleep for today!
trans: 没有问题！我昨天好好地睡了一觉！

name: 露莉亚
text: Me too! I made sure I ate all my breakfast!
trans: 是的！我今天早上也饱饱地吃足了早餐！

name: 维恩
text: That's the spirit! How about you, 姬塔? All good to go?
trans: 好的就是这个样子！姬塔看上去脸色也没有问题啊。

text: 姬塔 answers Vane with a smile and a nod.
trans: 姬塔对着维恩微笑着点头。

name: 维恩
text: All those gathered here today are tied by fate—we're family.
trans: 今天聚集在这里的人们，都是被命运连接在一起的家人。

name: 维恩
text: If you get tired, hurt, or have any problems at all, don't hesitate to ask Lancey or me for help!
trans: 途中要是体力不支或是有什么其他问题，不要客气地向我和兰酱开口吧！

name: 碧
text: Sure will! We're counting on ya!
trans: 哦！就拜托你们了！

name: 露莉亚
text: Hehe. Wow, Vane, you sound just like a mountain ranger!
trans: 嘿嘿，维恩先生，听上去就像山林冒险的队长一样很帅气呢！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Um, Vane... I've no doubt of your enthusiasm, but I just wanted to make sure you know the way.
trans: 那个，维恩……我不是想要怀疑你的热情，但是你应该知道该怎么走吧？

name: 维恩
text: You bet I do! I reviewed the route dozens of times for today!
trans: 当然咯！为了这一天我已经多次确认过路线啦！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: That's good to hear. Would you mind if I held onto the map though? Just in case.
trans: 那样就好，以防万一可以把地图交给我拿着吗？

name: 维恩
text: Here you go! Man, you're such a worrywart, Lancey!
trans: 拿好咯，真是的，兰酱真是爱担心呢。

text: 姬塔 and company breathe a sigh of relief as they see Lancelot grab hold of the map.
trans: 看到兰斯洛特拿到了地图姬塔和其他人都松了一口气。

name: 维恩
text: Now! Before we leave, let's do a head count! You start with number one, Vyrn!
trans: 好了，出发之前，我们先来点名咯，报数！

name: 碧
text: One!
trans: 一！

name: 露莉亚
text: Two!
trans: 二！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Three!
trans: 三！

text: Following Lancelot, 姬塔 calls out his number with gusto.
trans: 姬塔紧随着兰斯洛特开心地报出了数字。

name: 维恩
text: That's the spirit! Now, let's get moving!
trans: 就是这个样子，好了，出发！

text: The group had been somewhat concerned with Vane's knack for getting lost, but the knight's extensive preparation is soon apparent.
trans: 小队一开始还很关注维恩会不会迷路，但是很快他的充分准备就显现出了效果。

text: Vane's friends see him in a whole new light as he leads them.
trans: 维恩带领着友人们，仿佛脱胎换骨一样。

text: With the peak nearly in reach, Vane makes a stop along the way.
trans: 在接近顶峰的时候，维恩在路边停了下来。

name: 维恩
text: Lancey, Lancey! This is the place!
trans: 兰酱，兰酱！我记得就是这附近了吧！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: I remember! This was where the storm hit us.
trans: 啊我想起来了，就是在这里我们被暴雨拦住了。

name: 碧
text: And forced you guys to turn back, right?
trans: 这就是你们返程的地方，对吧？

name: 兰斯洛特
text: It was so bad that our squad had to take shelter behind some of the rocks here before we left.
trans: 啊，我们的小队在这里附近的岩石下躲避了一会儿。

name: 维恩
text: Ahh, this place brings back memories. I was so hungry that time—my stomach was killing me.
trans: 真是怀念啊，那个时候我肚子饿的可难受啦。

name: 露莉亚
text: Hehe, aren't you always hungry?
trans: 嘿嘿，维恩先生不是一直都很饿吗？

name: 维恩
text: Hey now! That's...
trans: 喂喂，那种事……

name: 维恩
text: Actually true!
trans: 说的没错！

name: 维恩
text: Guess I can't complain about that! Wahaha!
trans: 嘛，我也不知道为什么肚子就饿了呢！哈哈哈哈哈！

name: 露莉亚
text: Hehe! So where are we going to have lunch?
trans: 是的！那么……我们在哪里吃午饭呢？

name: 维恩
text: I'd love to chow down right here and now, but if we push just a little further, we can have lunch at the peak!
trans: 虽然我很想说在这里立刻就吃，但是如果我们再努力一下就到达山顶了，就在那里吃饭吧！

name: 碧
text: All right! Race you there! I'm gonna be first!
trans: 嘿嘿，好！我会是第一个到那里的！

name: 露莉亚
text: Vyrn! No fair!
trans: 阿碧太狡猾了！

name: 维恩
text: Hey! No running around or you're gonna hurt yourselves!
trans: 喂喂你们两个！跑那么快很危险哦！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Vane, leave those two to me.
trans: 维恩，他们两个的话交给我吧。

name: 维恩
text: Thanks, Lancey! Keep 'em safe!
trans: 谢啦兰酱，就交给你啦。

name: 维恩
text: Okay... 姬塔. This part's a little tricky. Give me your hand.
trans: 那个，姬塔，这个地方有点难走，把你的手递给我。

text: Taking hold of Vane's outstretched hand, 姬塔's body is lifted into the air.
trans: 抓住维恩伸过来的手，姬塔顺利度过了这段路。

text: 姬塔 thanks Vane for his kindness.
trans: 姬塔感谢维恩的帮助。

name: 维恩
text: Wahaha! It's nothing! I'll even piggyback you if you're tired! Just say the word!
trans: 嘿嘿嘿，不用客气，你累的话我还可以背着你，只要说句话就行。

name: 维恩
text: Whoops! We better get moving before we're left behind! C'mon!
trans: 不好，不能落后他们太多，我们也快走吧！

text: The group soon reaches the peak of the mountain without incident.
trans: 一队人很快在没有意外的情况下登上顶峰。

name: 碧
text: I did it! First place goes to me!
trans: 做到了！我是第一个到的！

name: 露莉亚
text: Pant... Pant... No fair, Vyrn. You can fly...
trans: 哈啊……哈啊……阿碧可以在空中飞，是犯规……

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Are you all right, Lyria? Sit down and rest.
trans: 你没事吧，露莉亚？要不要稍微坐下来休息一下？

name: 露莉亚
text: Th-thank you. I just need to catch my breath.
trans: 谢……谢谢，只要稍微休息一下，就没事了。

text: Not long after the others, Vane and 姬塔 arrive.
trans: 在其他人之后不久，维恩和姬塔也到达了。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Vane. We finally made it.
trans: 维恩，我们终于做到了。

name: 维恩
text: We did. And I'm glad I made it with you, Lancey.
trans: 啊，而且和兰酱一起来到这里，我很高兴哦。

text: The two knights bask in their achievement; they've finally finished what they started all so long ago.
trans: 两位骑士沉浸在他们的成就中，终于他们完成了很久之前就开始的未竟之事。

name: 维恩
text: Right! Now that the gang's all here...
trans: 好嘞！这样就全员到齐了吧？

name: 维恩
text: A very special surprise for all of you! Courtesy of mountain ranger Vane!
trans: 嘿嘿嘿，那么为了如此努力的大家，维恩队长有奖励！

text: From his bag Vane takes out a lunch box stuffed full of handmade sandwiches and delicacies.
trans: 从他的包里维恩拿出了装满手工三明治和其他精美食物的午餐盒。

name: 维恩
text: Feast your eyes on my specially made Vanewiches! Woke up at the break of dawn just to make 'em!
trans: 嘿嘿怎么样？我一大早起来做的，特制维恩便当！

name: 碧
text: Awesome! This is gonna be the best picnic ever!
trans: 好厉害！比想象中还要豪华的便当！

name: 露莉亚
text: Wow! They look absolutely delicious!
trans: 哇啊！看上去都非常好吃！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Heh. Good going, Vane.
trans: 辛苦你了，维恩。

name: 维恩
text: We couldn't have made it this far without each other! Great job, everyone!
trans: 都是多亏了大家的帮助这份便当才能平安无事地拿到这里。

name: 维恩
text: Now, let's get this picnic started!
trans: 好了队员们，准备开始宴会啦！

name: 碧
text: Yeah!
trans: 哦！

name: 露莉亚
text: Yeah!
trans: 哦！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Yeah!
trans: 哦！

text: The group gets busy setting up their little picnic.
trans: 队员们为了小小的野餐而忙碌起来。

text: Spreading the picnic blanket and sitting in a circle, they get ready to eat.
trans: 将食物分发完毕，坐成一圈后，他们做好了开餐的准备。

name: 维恩
text: Bon appetit!
trans: 我开动了！

name: 碧
text: Bon appetit!
trans: 我开动了！

name: 露莉亚
text: Bon appetit!
trans: 我开动了！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Bon appetit!
trans: 我开动了！

name: 维恩
text: Dig in, guys!
trans: 好！开始吃吧！

text: They waste no time in tasting their lovingly made treats.
trans: 他们立刻开始品尝这些精心制作的食物。

name: 露莉亚
text: Mmm! This is so yummy!
trans: 哦哦哦！这便当，十分的美味！

name: 碧
text: I'll be the judge of that... Mm! She's right! This is out of this world, Vane!
trans: 让我尝尝……嗯！果然骑士小哥做的东西很美味啊！

text: Sounds of delight and expressions of satisfaction fill the scene as they dig into the amazing-looking food.
trans: 伴随着众人享用精致的食物，整个山头都洋溢着愉快的声音和满意的表情。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Haha. Vane, you should open up a shop! These victuals would sell for sure!
trans: 哈哈，说的没错说的没错，维恩如果去开食品店的话，作为招牌菜肯定会大卖的吧。

name: 维恩
text: Vane's Vittles and Vanewiches! I like the sound of that!
trans: 维恩食品店吗……听上去很有趣啊！

name: 维恩
text: Wait, I can't manage a shop and be a first officer at the same time!
trans: 但是，维恩食品店什么的，我好歹也是一个副团长啊！

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Hahaha! Don't take it too seriously, friend. What would we ever do without our favorite first officer?
trans: 哈哈，开个玩笑啦，多受你关照啦，副团长大人。

name: 维恩
text: Aww. Oh well! I can still make food for everyone even without a shop!
trans: 切~嘛，大家都喜欢这顿午饭就好啦！

text: A happy and merry time it is on that mountain peak of Kirchberg.
trans: 基希贝格山上洋溢着快活的空气。

text: In the midst of the revelry, a light breeze greets the jolly picnickers.
trans: 在宴会中途，一股微风造访了各位愉快的野餐者。

text: Something small, light, and pink drifts down from above and lands in Lancelot's hair.
trans: 有一个小小的，轻轻的，粉粉的东西从空中飘落到兰斯洛特的头发上。

name: 维恩
text: Huh. A pink flower petal.
trans: 诶，这粉红的花瓣是什么。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Hm? Flower petal? Where?
trans: 嗯？花瓣？

name: 维恩
text: Don't move.
trans: 别动。

text: With delicate care, Vane plucks the tiny petal from Lancelot's locks.
trans: 维恩小心地把花瓣从兰斯洛特头发上拿下来。

name: 维恩
text: It's... beautiful.
trans: 真漂亮啊……

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Indeed.
trans: 是的。

text: Like warm snow on a spring day, the pink petals waft gently down from the trees.
trans: 就像是春日里温暖的雪花一样，花瓣从周围的树上轻轻飘落下来。

name: 维恩
text: Wow. I never knew such beautiful flowers bloomed up here.
trans: 我从来不知道山顶上还有这么漂亮的花在开放着啊。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: They must only bloom during this time of the year.
trans: 他们一定是只有在每年的这个时候才会开放吧。

name: 维恩
text: Lancey... promise me we'll come here again next year.
trans: 兰酱，明年我们再一起来这里吧。

name: 兰斯洛特
text: Haha. An easy promise.
trans: 嘿嘿，当然了！

text: Enthralled at the magical beauty before them, Vane and Lancelot vow to return when springtime comes again.
trans: 被眼前的美景所吸引的二人，约定好了在下一个春日再次来到这里。

text: Just as the blossoms atop that mountain continue to bloom, so does the camaraderie between the two knights ever flourish.
trans: 就像山顶上的花还会再一次盛开，两位骑士之间的友爱也永远都不会凋谢。
